replies.body: Discrimination terms like "%%%got" are ban accelerators and will raise your punishment significantly and immediately.
But still still why i got instantly the 3rd punishment
Literally for what he stated.  Riot has a zero tolerance policy for it

You were escalated past chat restrictions because on top of your chat being overly toxic (quite toxic, more than just a little), you were using discriminatory and offensive terms in your chat. This included, which you called a person who you thought was playing bad.

Come off the ban and try to not be toxic.

It's no different than any other punishment system.  The more severe the infraction, the more sever the penalty.  You can get insta-permabanned if what you say is deemed bad enough.

Want a solution?  Stop chatting.  Seriously...EVERY one of these posts has a dictionary of chat logs.  If you are chatting, you aren't playing.
But if i dont chat i cant just communicate with pings
You actually can quite well.  I rarely type and mostly just ping my intention, and still win a majority of matches
Do punishments drop down? and if yes how long it takes for each one? And also when i can play again what should i do? like mute all? or what?

Your account slowly resets to normal if you don't get reports like this again.  As for what you should do, either mute everyone, or learn to think before you type so you don't say something you might regret

Your honor will start at 2.  However, your account status will not be clean due to this infraction.  Your honor goes up by playing in general and goes up faster by being honored.  Honor goes down by being reported

> [{quoted}](name=Nailington,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=smpXlK4a,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-15T15:45:04.620+0000)

> Your honor will start at 2.  However, your account status will not be clean due to this infraction.  Your honor goes up by playing in general and goes up faster by being honored.  Honor goes down by being reported

What do you mean my account status will not be clean?

Your account is basically marked based on what punishment you received last.  This will remain that way for a while, even if you exhibit good behavior... It's a decay process.  Basically, your account is such that if you get reported and punished now for something you will get the next punishment in the progression.  However, in a month that happens, you may get the punishment you got now or the one below it.  Just an example.  Not so much an account status as an account record held by Riot.  Kind of like a driving record
